page.title: 04ACTIVITIES LICKEY/CATSHILL.
page.content: { Clubs { }In our area we have four playgroups:Marlbrook,Lickey,Catshill, Cofton Hackett.Playgroup is a club for under fives.They pay a fee of about 75p per session. These clubs are held at St.Luke's Church Centre, Marlbrook, which is a typical place for clubs in our area. There is a 'Golden Circle Club' (which is for over 60's),a slimmers club,(which is a group of ladies who like to keep slim), a keep_fit club, Brownies (who meet on Wednesday evenings), Thursday club, Girl Guides and Rangers who meet every Friday evening. {Recreation/Parks There are a lot of parks in our area.There is the Beacon which is very popular for walking,dog exercising and
